title: Jhonny73
author: Jhonny73
content: Selling aged Ticketmaster accounts made in 2002-2018.  They can be transferred to your domain/catchall.  Price is $25 each for bulk deals (200+) I can offer $20 each.  If you are interested/have a special request feel free to dm me on discord Foxz#1493.

comments.author: ticketmaster100
comments.body: Attention all ticket brokers and ticket resellers!Are you looking for an instant and reliable way to buy ticketmaster accounts? Look no further!We cut out all of the drama of ticketmaster account buying by providing customers with a straight forward and easy to navigate website. We don't do business any other way!Visit us and try for yourself! ??https://t.me/ticketmaster100Use code BULK25 for 25% OFF Bulk Orders!Write a positive review for an extra # code!WHAT WE SELL:- 2002 to 2009 Bulk- 2010 to 2014 Bulk- 2016 to 2018 Bulk- stand alone accounts from 2002-2018(stock may vary)MORE ABOUT US:- All of our accounts were bought from real fans and concert goers- None of our accounts were obtained illegally (i.e. hacking, data leaks)- You will instantly receive your account(s) in the form of [email:password] to the email you provide us.- We do honor account warranties. For bulk accounts, you have 6 hours from the time you received it to report any issues or a request replacements. For individual accounts, you have 3 hours. Don't worry if we don't respond to you within that time frame!- You are allowed to change the credentials to the account once you received it, but keep in mind your warranty becomes null and void the moment you do so! We cannot assist you once the email/password has been changed!- Support is available from 8 am to 8 pm EST. Expect a response within 2 hours
